summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a potential client, Dr. Richard Merkin. Epstein advises Merkin to speak with Staley and JPMorgan regarding his interest in becoming a client. The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley regarding a potential client, Dr. Richard Merkin.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of Epstein's email and is advised to discuss Dr. Merkin's potential client status.

persons.name: Dr. Richard Merkin
persons.context: Merkin is mentioned as someone who has approached Epstein to become a client.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email to Jes Staley regarding Dr. Richard Merkin's interest in becoming a client.
Epstein advised Merkin to talk to JPMorgan and Staley.
Dr. Richard Merkin is identified as a friend of the Milken family.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
